cs_mountain_flash.text:
You cling to icy rock—climbing a snowy mountain.
A blinding flash.

cs_planets_walk.text:
You walk through a scenery where multiple planets hang in the sky.

You (out of breath): "Where is it?"

You follow a wisp of light.

Stranger: "You should hurry up."

cs_stranger_silent.text:
You say nothing.

The stranger’s presence fades.

Stranger: "You don’t have much time left before [[glitch:th3 c0ll@pse]]... just remember [[glitch:th3 l1ght]]"

cs_stranger_ask.text:
You: "Who are you?"

Stranger: "No time. You should hurry up... just remember [[glitch:th3 l1ght]]"

bedroom_wakeup.name: You
bedroom_wakeup.text:
You wake up.

You stare at your hand.
It flickers—glitches.

"...I must still be asleep."

action.text:
Several planets hang in the sky.

"Is it just me... or does the sky look slightly different today?"

Your laptop is on... but nothing connects.

"No signal? Weird..."

"I really need a new device... or maybe the Wi-Fi’s just dead."

bedroom_reflection.name: You
bedroom_reflection.text:
"I feel like I woke up from a really long dream... but I can’t remember it at all."

"Like there’s something I need to find... but what?"

"Ugh... I feel nauseous... I’m tired of feeling like this."

alarm_late.name: You
alarm_late.text:
ALARM RINGS AGAIN.

"Shoot—I'm gonna be late for work!"

train_ride_1.name: You
train_ride_1.text:
Rumble. Rumble.

"It’s so packed today... I guess everyone’s late as well."

"My boss is so gonna kill me... and I’m working overtime again..."

train_ride_2.name: You
train_ride_2.text:
"I really wonder how I ended up working a 9-5... becoming a slave to a paycheck..."

"But I need it to survive and pay my rent..."

"I guess there really is no escape from capitalism..."

train_window_thought.name: You
train_window_thought.text:
You look out the window.

"It’s odd... every time I look outside there’s a loud silence screaming at me..."

"Telling me I should be doing more with myself..."

"But it’s not like I can do anything... can I?"

train_sleep.text:
"I’m feeling sleepy again... a quick nap never hurt anyone..."

"I’ll wake up at my stop. I promise."

train_wake_shaking.name: You
train_wake_shaking.text:
You wake up to the train shaking.

"What the hell is going on?"

train_realise_empty.name: You
train_realise_empty.text:
You look around.

Everyone on the train has disappeared.
The lights flicker on and off.

The hairs on your neck stand up.

Maybe you're still dreaming.
You pinch yourself.

Nothing happens—except red marks all over your arms.

You freeze.

(...): "That’s not going to do anything so you should give up."

voice_mutter.text: "...I swear to the 12 primordial gods... they must’ve given you to me as some kind of punishment..."

voice_excuse.text: "Oh! And you have an attitude! Do you want to get help or not?"

choices.text: "What kind of sick joke is this?! I'm going to be late for work!"

voice_show.text: "This is a first—being ordered around by a human... Do you even realise the situation you’re in?"

choices.text: "If you want me to understand, show yourself and explain."
"What do you mean by a human?"
"AHH! What the hell! ...Oh god I'm actually going to be sick"
"Why is there a kid here? Where did you come from?!"

child_appears_plain.text:
A small child steps into view.

"...Yeah. Surprise."

choices.text: "Why is there a kid here? Where did you come from?!"
"...What's that supposed to mean?..and sent here? by who?..and where did everyone go?"

child_work.text:
"Work? No wonder you got sent here..."

"To think of all souls—YOURS would end up like this..."

choices.text: "...What's that supposed to mean?..and sent here? by who?..and where did everyone go?"

child_explain.text:
"Jeez... so much for having a surprise appearance..."

"To explain... have you noticed something different about yourself lately?"

"The nauseating pit in your gut..?"

"Feeling both the worlds inside and outside of you slipping through the palms of the fabric of what you know as reality?"

choices.text: "...What's that supposed to mean?..and sent here? by who?..and where did everyone go?"

child_where_everyone.text: "Look through the window... does this really seem like the same train you were on this morning??"

child_kid.text: "You worry about the wrong things.. Take a look outside.."

child_sick.text:
"Please don’t. Just the talk of it makes me gag...."

"Now... I assume you have some clue why you're here.. I mean take a look outside."

train_space_reveal.name: You
train_space_reveal.text:
You look out the window.

Only stars.
A spacelike void.

This is not the morning commute.

Your reflection flickers.

"...This can’t be real."
